events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, and I would like to request a refund because the size does not fit and I no longer want to keep the item.
The customer's request has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to keywords related to refund and return of the purchased jacket.
The case has been assigned to agent Lucy for handling the refund request regarding the jacket order.
